name: Neon havoc
description:
Play as a triangle battling though waves of enemies across different levels in this super polished minimalistic  top down shooter. Each level has a different amount of waves gradually getting harder as the games goes on. The final level is an epic boss fight to test your true skills.

This game was made in about 24 hours of dev time spread out across the space of a month. I would have liked to do more with this game but as i have a lot of time this summer i wanted wrap up some projects i have abandoned.

I submitted to the solo development jam as a way to help me finish the project game jams help me try to finish my project and this was the perfect jam for that.

Almost everything in this game was created but me however the following two soundtracks are used from opengameart.org.

Blaze rail 2

Tower defence DST
